resources.string: Do you know, Saturn is the sixth planet from the sun and the second largest planet in the solar system. And also Saturn is the root of the English word "Saturday". How much do you know about the sixth planet from the sun? \n\nWith 8 Planets you get to know more!!!
How Well Do You Know The 8 Planets of Our Solar System?
Click on the button to test your knowledge about the planets in our solar system.
Which of the planets are found in our Solar System?
The temperature on this planet\'s surface is hot enough to melt lead. Which one is it?
Which of the phenomena occurs on Mars?
Which of the planets have rings?
How many moons is Pluto known to have as of July 2012 ?
True or false? Neptune is larger than Saturn.
The sixth planet from the Sun features an extensive ring system, what is the name of this planet?
What planet in the solar system is farthest from the Sun?
Now that Pluto is no longer included, how many planets are there in the Solar System?
True or false? Venus has more atmospheric pressure than Earth?
